items.title: The plight of people behind bars in the U.S. during the...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

The plight of people behind bars in the U.S. during the coronavirus pandemic is dire. Prisoners and detainees are getting sick and dying at highly elevated rates, and without immediate and sweeping action, mass deaths—disproportionately of poor, Black, Brown, and Indigenous people—are a certainty. This is why PSL Denver is backing tomorrow’s Decarceration Day of Action, organized by the Colorado ACLU and endorsed by more than 50 local organizations.

Join the rally at noon tomorrow at the capitol, and demand Governor Polis immediately release all elderly, vulnerable, non-dangerous, and non-convicted inmates and all ICE detainees!

items.title: The plight of people behind bars in the U.S. during the...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

The plight of people behind bars in the U.S. during the coronavirus pandemic is dire. Prisoners and detainees are getting sick and dying at highly elevated rates, and without immediate and sweeping action, mass deaths—disproportionately of poor, Black, Brown, and Indigenous people—are a certainty. This is why PSL Denver is backing tomorrow’s Decarceration Day of Action. Join the rally at noon tomorrow at the capitol and read Dr. Apryl Alexander’s opinion piece on the day of a...ction in the Denver Post.

“After briefly allowing increased prisoner releases, the governor has rescinded that authority and refuses to exercise any of his broad powers to safely reduce the prison population.

Surely, the governor is aware that the United States incarcerates people at a higher rate than any other country in the world, and that mass incarceration has destroyed Black communities, without improving public safety. Surely he is aware that our carceral system is founded on racist principles, and the racial make-up of our prisons is a reflection of historical and ongoing systemic racism.

Yet, rather than acknowledging the humanity of people living behind bars and the racism underlying the prison system, Gov. Polis has contributed to a public narrative that demonizes incarcerated people as unredeemable and too dangerous to be free. When advocates called for thoughtful releases of vulnerable incarcerated people, Gov. Polis’ response: He would not “let dangerous criminals out.”

Come on, governor. No one wants you to release “dangerous criminals.” We all want to be safe. That’s why advocates have been calling for the release of people who are elderly, sick, or have otherwise proven they are not a public safety threat. Decades of mass incarceration has ensured that there are many such people in Colorado’s prisons, and racism has ensured that those people will be disproportionately Black.

Here’s just one example: Ron Johnson is a 62-year-old Black grandfather who has turned his life around in prison. He suffers from asthma, high blood pressure, and uses an inhaler to breathe, so he is at high risk for COVID. He is no threat to the public. He lives in an incentive unit where he cares for other incarcerated people with medical disabilities and mentors incarcerated people earning their GED.”

See MoreBlack people living behind bars face a racist double whammy – because of their blackness they are more likely to be imprisoned, more likely to get COVID, and more likely to die from the virus.

denverpost.com

Guest commentary: If Black lives matter to him, Polis needs to reduce prison population

items.title: Cops and the Klan go hand-in-hand. WATCH THIS CLIP! This footage...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Cops and the Klan go hand-in-hand. WATCH THIS CLIP! This footage was taken 15 minutes before the Kenosha shooter Kyle Rittenhouse murdered two anti-racist protesters and injured a third. The cops offer the armed white supremacist vigilantes water (Rittenhouse is the one walking over to get water), and thank them for what they are doing. At the very same time, they are ordering protesters to clear the streets. 15 minutes later Kyle Rittenhouse shot 3 protesters, gave a hand si...gn to the cops, and walked right past 3 police vehicles without even being stopped.

As the system tries to clamp down on the anti-racist uprising sweeping the country, the police keep further exposing that they are not an institution with the purpose of protecting our communities, but a violent repressive force dedicated to upholding a white supremacist order. They will join forces with openly racist elements of the population who will aid them in accomplishing this task.

The anti-racist uprising of people in this country is a real threat to white supremacy, and this country’s rulers know it! Keep up the fight!

See More“LOOK AT THIS CLIP! LOOK! THEY ARE WORKING ALONGSIDE THE POLICE https://t.co/BPL5clfjrc”

items.title: In response to the COVID-19 pandemic, Quierza Lewis began...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

In response to the COVID-19 pandemic, Quierza Lewis began organizing as inmates were dying, guards were without protective equipment and social distancing an impossibility in an overcrowded prison — especially Angola the largest maximum-security prison in the United States.

Since his email communications with outside organizers were discovered by officials, Quierza has been placed in administrative segregation–solitary. Two other inmates who were also in communication with th...e same activist were not targeted by the prison system.

When the prison system moved to place Quierza in solitary in May there were already eight COVID-19 deaths among inmates with life sentences in Angola.

https://www.liberationnews.org/its-a-death-trap-angola-inm…/

See More“Because of COVID, you know, many are at risk due to pre-existing conditions...." #COVID19 #lousiana #Massincarceration

items.title: The Democratic National Convention proves exactly how far right...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

The Democratic National Convention proves exactly how far right the Democrat Party continues to move. It was also an exercise in cowardly fear in the face of Trump’s open redbaiting and Muslim baiting. That was the stated reason that the party’s most popular liberal member of the House, Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, received just 90 seconds to speak. That’s precisely why the Biden team joined in Trump’s condemnation of Palestinian activist Linda Sarsour after she spoke as an invited guest on a panel discussion at the convention. That’s why Republican billionaires, militarists and anti-abortion politicians were given major roles.

Convention highlights war makers, marginalizes progressives. #elections

liberationnews.org

Convention: Having squelched left, DNC pivots hard right

Convention highlights war makers, marginalizes progressives. #electionsConvention highlights war makers, marginalizes progressives. #elections

items.title: This Black August, there can be no doubt that the conditions...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

This Black August, there can be no doubt that the conditions that George Jackson and the prisoners of the Attica Rebellion lost their lives rebelling against in 1971 are still in place today. The neglect this government shows to Black, Brown, Indigenous, LGBTQ+ and poor folks on a daily basis is doubled behind prison walls, and tripled under pandemic conditions.

Today we brought our protest to the Denver County Jail, the Denver Women’s Correctional Facility, and the Aurora G...EO ICE Detention Center. Though this system tries to hide the horrendous abuse that happens behind bars out of sight, we will not leave behind those in cages in our struggle. We raise the following demands, recognizing that if they are not met, more unnecessary death is a certainty:

1. Immediate humanitarian release of all ICE detainees and all vulnerable inmates, those convicted for non-violent offenses, and those who have not been convicted at all.

2. Where people remain behind bars, drastically increase medical staffing and supplies to local jails and state prisons, and guarantee sanitary conditions for all inmates.

3. Free all political prisoners!

Thank you to Black Lives Matter 5280, Sanctuary4All Colorado for cohosting this event! #FreeThemAll #LiberaATodos

See More+9

items.title: “Suspended” means he’ll be back on the job soon. Are you...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

“Suspended” means he’ll be back on the job soon. Are you comfortable with this man carrying a badge and a gun, having the ability to pull you or your child over?

Our communities deserve better. PSL has been talking to our neighbors about the police and we have heard too many mothers tell us they keep their children inside because of the police, or they religiously call their adult children every Sunday to make sure they survived the cops’ weekend patrols.

We need to fight back! Join the Denver-Aurora March Against Racism & Police Violence (https://www.facebook.com/events/351526215840428/) on August 30 and encourage your neighbors and friends to come with you. Only the people united can put an end to racist police terror!

A Colorado Springs cop has been temporarily suspended after an investigation found he commented “KILL THEM ALL” on a livestream video of a police brutality protest in June. Colorado Spr…

items.title: PLEASE BE AWARE: The Party for Socialism and Liberation (PSL) is...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

PLEASE BE AWARE: The Party for Socialism and Liberation (PSL) is not affiliated with this event! This event is fake and a duplicate of a real event, Elijah’s Life Celebration, which was recently cancelled by Elijah McClain’s mom.

This is one of several fake event pages made to look like real events, including PSL events, that an unidentified person has created.

Please check the hosts listed on any events you are considering attending to be sure they are groups you know. Thi...s person has also been making new Facebook pages to host the fake events.

And please SHARE this post!

Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverBreakThrough News

Some say the selection of Kamala Harris is a product of the anti-racist uprising. Or is she its opposite? BT looks at her long career as a prosecutor, in which she fought freedom for the wrongfully accused, criminalized working class parents, and covered up police misconduct.

items.title: “A key element of the pragmatic argument is to play up the...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

“A key element of the pragmatic argument is to play up the “historic” importance of the current election. Even if we oppose the Democrats on a good many issues, this year the Republicans are so evil and the implications so grave that we must “tactically” and “temporarily” unite with the Democratic Party. But the notion of “temporary” support is disproven by the fact these “leftists” have been saying the exact same thing every four years for decades!

What they are reinforcing ...is not some tactical exception, but a political strategy based on repeated and periodic unity with the “less evil” section of the ruling class.

What has this strategy, the same at each election, delivered? Even when the Democrats have been in complete control of government, the year-to-year drift in U.S. politics has been towards the right, attacks on labor, severe austerity, a racist and draconian criminal justice system and renewed assaults on women’s rights. This has been the case under Obama too.
...
Two points must be emphasized: 1) To shift the political climate in favor of poor and working people requires a mass movement embodying their demands. 2) The Democratic Party will never represent such a movement, and only seek to misrepresent it for its own purposes.

Millions of people agree with the first point, but are not yet sure of the second. The elections must be used as a venue to speak directly to these issues, clarify the nature of capitalism and expose the country’s political leadership.”

See MoreWhile defenders of the "lesser evil" Democratic Party believe they are holding the line against even further right-wing encroachment, they in fact encourage it. #elections #socialism

liberationnews.org

‘Lesser-evil’ politics demoralize and demobilize progressives

items.title: Join the exciting livestream party on Monday August 10th at 4pm...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Join the exciting livestream party on Monday August 10th at 4pm Pacific / 7pm Eastern to send letters to Mutulu Shakur.

Mutulu Shakur contributed to civil rights black and liberation struggles in the late 1960’s to the 1980’s. He also participated in presentations to the United Nations about the racism experienced by Black people in the U.S. He has been imprisoned for 33 years and denied parole eight times, during this time he was diagnosed with bone cancer. He needs our support!

Party for Socialism and Liberation - PSL was live.

items.title: On Saturday, July 25, a protest we organized to demand justice...
items.content_html:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

On Saturday, July 25, a protest we organized to demand justice for Elijah McClain was violently attacked by two white men who attempted to drive a Jeep through a crowd of hundreds of anti-racist protesters. The two men were not arrested, but instead were given assistance by police and let go. This attack was nothing less than white supremacist terrorism intended to halt the advance of the anti-racist struggle. Just as white supremacy resisted the advance towards equality duri...ng Reconstruction and the Civil Rights movement, so it does today. It is critical that in these moments, we stand together as a community and demonstrate our commitment to carrying forward the struggle against racism.

Join us August 30 for a march bringing together Denver and Aurora to demonstrate our unity and determination in the fight against racism and police violence. Attendees are invited to march on foot or in their cars. Please stay tuned for opportunities to volunteer and otherwise support this event. If you are a community leader or part of an organization that would like to endorse this demonstration, please message us!

Event page: https://facebook.com/events/351526215840428/

See More
